mapper.select: select count(*) from campLikeLoc WHERE userID=#{userID}

SELECT a.rm, a.* FROM ( select rownum as rm, l.*, c.campImg, c.campName, c.campAddr from campLikeLoc l, campsite c WHERE l.campKeyNum = c.campKeyNum AND userID=#{userID}) a WHERE a.rm>=#{startRow} AND a.rm<=#{endRow} ORDER BY a.campLikeLoc DESC

select count(*) FROM(SELECT rownum as rm, a.* FROM(SELECT t2.campReservNum, t4.campImg,t4.campName,t2.campRoom, t2.campRoomCount,t2.campReservStart, t2.campReservEnd, t3.campPayAmt, t2.campReservCheck, t2.userkeynum,t2.campReservDate FROM userinfo t1 INNER JOIN campReserv t2 ON t1.userkeynum = t2.userkeynum INNER JOIN campPay t3 ON t2.campReservNum = t3.campReservNum INNER JOIN campsite t4 ON t3.campKeyNum = t4.campKeyNum ORDER BY campReservNum DESC)a WHERE a.userkeynum = #{userKeyNum})b

SELECT b.* FROM(SELECT rownum as rm, a.* FROM(SELECT t4.campKeyNum,t3.campPayKeyNum, t2.campReservNum,t4.campImg,t4.campName,t2.campRoom, t2.campRoomCount,t2.campReservStart, t2.campReservEnd, t3.campPayAmt, t2.campReservCheck, t2.userkeynum,t2.campReservDate, t3.campReviewCheck
FROM userinfo t1 INNER JOIN campReserv t2 ON t1.userkeynum = t2.userkeynum INNER JOIN campPay t3 ON t2.campReservNum = t3.campReservNum INNER JOIN campsite t4 ON t3.campKeyNum = t4.campKeyNum ORDER BY campReservNum DESC)a WHERE a.userkeynum = #{userKeyNum})b WHERE b.rm>=#{startRow} AND b.rm<=#{endRow}

select count(*) FROM(SELECT rownum as rm, a.* FROM(select p.userKeynum, p.prodKeyNum,p.prodOrderNum, p.prodDetailNum, p.prodDate, pd.prodImage, pd.prodTitle, p.prodCartCount, p.prodpayAmt, p.prodOrderCheck, p.whetherReview from prodOrderDetail p, prod pd WHERE p.prodKeyNum = pd.prodKeyNum ORDER BY p.prodOrderNum DESC, p.prodDetailNum DESC)a WHERE a.userKeynum=#{userKeyNum})b

SELECT b.* FROM(SELECT rownum as rm, a.* FROM(select p.userKeynum, p.prodKeyNum,p.prodOrderNum, p.prodDetailNum, p.prodDate, pd.prodImage, pd.prodTitle, p.prodCartCount, p.prodpayAmt, p.prodOrderCheck, p.whetherReview from prodOrderDetail p, prod pd WHERE p.prodKeyNum = pd.prodKeyNum ORDER BY p.prodOrderNum DESC, p.prodDetailNum DESC)a WHERE a.userKeynum=#{userKeynum})b WHERE b.rm>=#{startRow} AND b.rm<=#{endRow}
